thread.title: This Portland Missed Connection Has The Whole Internet Pitching In To Help
thread.title_full: This Portland Missed Connection Has The Whole Internet Pitching In To Help

author: alexlovendahl
title: This Portland Missed Connection Has The Whole Internet Pitching In To Help
text:
View this image › 
ID: 10750981 3. Anyways, they had a live show in Portland last weekend, which also happened to be the site of an as of yet unsolved missed connection. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @travismcelroy ID: 10751059 4. Here it is: View this image › 
ID: 10753200 5. Since then, people have been posting day and night in search of this mysterious man. There’s even a hashtag for it: #goodboywatch. View this image › 
ID: 10753203 6. One sleuth even provided a photo of what he might look like, based on the description. View this image › 
ID: 10753205 7. The oldest brother, Justin McElroy, got involved on the third day. If you’re a guy who wore plaid to the MBMBaM Portland show and asked a lady out, she’s ready for that drink now. https://t.co/lYpQysU97p
— Justin McElroy (@JustinMcElroy) ID: 10751147 8. Even Lin Manuel Miranda offered his assistance! View this image › 
ID: 10753206 9. Do YOU know of any hot leads? Help this meet-up happen, and help Jenna fill her drink! View this image › 
ID: 10750933 10. Did you know you can sign up for a BuzzFeed Community account and create your own BuzzFeed posts? Here’s a handy guide to help you start posting today ! ID: 10760171 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
This post was created by a member of BuzzFeed Community, where anyone can post awesome lists and creations. Learn more or post your buzz!
